name: Tobias Tales
description:
A side-scroller about a small pug on his quest to save this world.

Click the pug-nose in order to start the game.

— DATE
March, 2017.

— DEVELOPMENT TEAM
Me(Programmer)
Luiz Pismel (Level Designer)
Rafael Carrion (2D Artist)
Rodrigo Ramalho (Writer?)

— CONTROLS

A or DMove Left or RightWJUMPFAttack
